{"id":941897549,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1682825480,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"65 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/941897549/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Determine the Winner of a Bowling Game","memory":"72 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int isWinner(vector<int>& player1, vector<int>& player2) {\n        int score1 = 0, score2 = 0;\n        int cur1 = 0, cur2 = 0, prev1 = 0, prev2 = 0;\n\n        for (int i = 0; i < player1.size(); i++) {\n            // player 1 turn\n            cur1 = player1[i];\n            prev1 = i >= 1 ? player1[i-1] : 0;\n            prev2 = i >= 2 ? player1[i-2] : 0;\n\n            if (prev1 == 10 || prev2 == 10) {\n                score1 += (2 * cur1);\n            } else {\n                score1 += cur1;\n            }\n\n            // player 2 turn\n            cur2 = player2[i];\n            prev1 = i >= 1 ? player2[i-1] : 0;\n            prev2 = i >= 2 ? player2[i-2] : 0;\n\n            if (prev1 == 10 || prev2 == 10) {\n                score2 += (2 * cur2);\n            } else {\n                score2 += cur2;\n            }\n        }\n\n        if (score1 > score2) {\n            return 1;\n        } else if (score2 > score1) {\n            return 2;\n        } else {\n            return 0;\n        }\n\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"determine-the-winner-of-a-bowling-game","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
